thread.title: Very good hotel in Beijing !!
thread.title_full: Very good hotel in Beijing !! - Review of New World Beijing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Javierchik08
title: Very good hotel in Beijing !!
text:
Location of this hotel is the best, restaurants and food quality is amazing and bar options even better. Service is kind and attentive and the most important, they speak English ( believe me , it was like an oasis in China)
The rooms are big and comfortable, clean and complete amenities make your stay memorable.
The only "But" was the air conditioning in my room. It was impossible to control and it was always at 27 Celsius a complete oven !!!!
I asked for help and never went to solve it.
After this only detail, they lost the perfect 10 so I give this hotel an 8/10. I will return for sure here in my next China trip.
